attributes.action: Prevent the Pope from visiting the UK on the grounds of his hateful views to the LGBT community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After Pope Benedict XVI continued attacks against LGBT people around the globe, and his refusal to sanction the use of condoms to prevent the spread of AIDS in developing countries, it goes completely against the attitude of our modern secular society to allow this preacher of hate into the UK.  

We would like to express our feeling of disgust that this man should be allowed the dignity of a State visit to the UK.
